column2: "Nna wɔdze sor ahenman no bɔto mbaabun du a wɔfaa hɔn nkandzea dɛ worikehyia ayeforkun kwan no ho."
"Na hɔn mu beenum yɛɛ mbadwemba
column4: wɔannyɛ mbadwemba."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔannyɛ mbadwemba no
column4: wɔammfa ngo annka ho;"

column2: "na mbadwemba no faa ngo guu hɔn ntoa mu kaa hɔn nkandzea no ho."
"Na ayeforkun no kyɛree no
column3: hɔn nyina totɔɔ nkom na wɔdedae."

column2: "Na esuom no
column4: Hwɛ
column5: ayeforkun no reba o! Hom nkɔ nkehyia no."

column2: "Nna mbaabun no nyina soɛree na wɔkekaa hɔn nkandzea."
"Na hɔn a wɔannyɛ mbadwemba no see mbadwemba no dɛ
column3: Hom mma hɛn hom ngo no bi
column4: na hɛn nkandzea rudundum."

column2: "Na mbadwemba no buaa dɛ
column4: bɛyɛ na ɔronnso hɛn nye hom; na mbom hom nkɔ hɔn a wɔtɔn no hɔ nkɔtɔ homdze."

column2: "Na wɔkɔree rokɔtɔ no
column4: na hɔn a wɔayɛ krado no nye no kɔr ayefor ase

column2: "Na ekyir no na mbaabun nkaa no so bae bɛsee dɛ
column4: owura

column2: "Na ɔno dze
column4: Nokwar mese hom dɛ

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nweɔn
column3: na hom nnyim da no anaa dɔn no
column4: (a Nyimpa ba no bɛba.)"
column5: "#25.13 Tsetse Akyerɛwfo binom mmfa a Nyimpa ba no nnka ho."

column2: "Na ɔtse dɛ nyimpa a ɔrodɔ mu akɔ beebi a ɔfrɛɛ no nkowaa
column3: na ɔdze n’adze a ɔwɔ hyɛɛ hɔn nsa."

column2: "Na ɔmaa baako talent enum
column4: na ɔbaako so kor
column5: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn nyina hɔn tum tse

column2: "Na ntsɛmara nyia onyaa talent enum no kɔree
column4: na onyaa ho talent enum so."

column2: "Dɛmara so na nyia onyaa ebien no
"Na nyia onyaa kor no
column4: na ɔdze no wura ne sika no sumae."

column2: "Na ɔkyɛree kyɛree no
column3: nkowaa no hɔn wura no bae
column4: na ɔnye hɔn bobuu nkontaa."

column2: "Na nyia onyaa talent enum no bae dze talent enum ka ho baa dɛ
column4: edze talent enum hyɛɛ me nsa: hwɛ
column5: menya ho talent enum aka ho."

column2: "No wura see no dɛ
column4: edzi ndzɛmba kumaabi ho nokwar: medze wo besi ndzɛmba pii do: kɔ wo wura dɛw mu."

column2: "Na nyia onyaa talent ebien no so bae
column4: Mo wura
column5: edze talent ebien hyɛɛ me nsa: hwɛ
column6: menya ho talent ebien aka ho."

column2: "No wura see no dɛ
column4: edzi ndzɛmba kumaabi ho nokwar
column5: medze wo besi ndzɛmba pii do: kɔ wo wura dɛw mu."

column2: "Na nyia onyaa talent kor no so bae bɛsee dɛ
column4: minyim wo dɛ eyɛ nyimpa a eyɛ dzen a itwa wɔ mbrɛ innduae
column5: na eboaboa ano wɔ mbrɛ emmfae mmpetsee;"

column2: "na musuroi
column4: na medze wo talent no kosumaa daadze: hwɛ

column2: "Na no wura buae see no dɛ
column4: inyim dɛ mutwa wɔ mbrɛ munnduae
column5: na moboaboa ano wɔ mbrɛ memmfae mmpetsee:"

column2: "dɛm ntsi nkyɛ ɔsɛ wo dɛ edze me sika kɛma sikasesafo
column4: mabɛgye m’adze nye no ho nsiho."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: hom ngye talent no wɔ ne nsamu
column4: na hom mfa mma nyia ɔwɔ talent du no."

column2: "Osiandɛ obiara a ɔwɔ no
column3: wɔbɛma no na oenya mbordo; na nyia onnyi no
column4: dza ɔwɔ no mpo

column2: "Na akowaa a no ho nnyi mfaso no dze
column3: hom ntow no nkyen ekyirekyir sum no mu: hɔ na osu nye asetwɛr wɔ."

column2: "Na aber a nyimpa Ba no bɛba wɔ n’enyimnyam mu
column3: na n’abɔfoe no nyina ka no ho no
column4: nna ɔbɛtsena n’enyimnyam ahengua no do;"

column2: "na wɔbɔboaboa amanaman nyina ano wɔ n’enyim
column3: na ɔbɛpaapaa hɔn mu dɛ mbrɛ oguanhwɛfo paapaa nguan nye mpɔnkye mu;"

column2: "na ɔdze nguan no begyina n’enyimfa
column3: na ɔdze mpɔnkye no egyina n’abankum."

column2: "Nna Ɔhen no bɛse hɔn a wɔwɔ n’enyimfa no dɛ
column4: hom a m’Egya ehyira hom
column5: hom mbɛfa ahenman a wofitsi wiadze ahyɛse siesiei maa hom no ntsena mu:"

column2: "osiandɛ ɔkɔm dzee me
column3: na hom maa me edziban; nsukɔm dzee me
column4: na hom maa me anondze; meyɛɛ hɔho
column5: na hom faa me kɔr fie;"

column2: "midzii adagyaw
column3: na hom furaa me tam; meyaree
column4: na hom bɔhwɛɛ me; medaa efiadze na hom baa me nkyɛn."

column2: "Ɔno na atsenenee no bobua ase no dɛ
column4: dabɛn na yehun wo dɛ ɔkɔm dze wo

column2: "Dabɛn na yehun wo dɛ eyɛ hɔho na yɛfaa wo kɔr fie
column4: na yefuraa wo tam?"

column2: "Anaa dabɛn na yehun wo dɛ eyar anaa eda efiadze
"Na Ɔhen no bobua ase hɔn dɛ
column4: Susuampa dɛ hom ayɛ ama mo nuanom nketseaba yi mu kor no

column2: "Ɔno na ɔbɛse hɔn a wɔwɔ bankum no so dɛ
column4: hom mfi me nkyɛn nkɔ onnyiewiei gya a woesiesie ama abɔnsam nye n’abɔfoe no no mu."

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔkɔm dzee me
column3: na hom amma me edziban; nsukɔm dzee me
column4: na hom amma me anondze;"

column2: "meyɛɛ hɔho
column3: na hom ammfa me annkɔ fie; midzii adagyaw
column4: na hom emmfura me tam; meyaree na medaa efiadze

column2: "Ɔno na hɔn so bobua ase dɛ
column4: dabɛn na yehun wo dɛ ɔkɔm dze wo

column2: "Ɔno na obobua hɔn dɛ
column4: Susuampa dɛ hom annyɛ amma hom nuanom nketseaba yi mu kor no

column2: "Na yinom bɔkɔ onnyiewiei amandzehu no mu
column3: na atsenenee no bɔkɔ onnyiewiei nkwa no mu."
